short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open new windows in split screen on multiple monitors without wasting precious space

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create any layout for any of your monitors,  highlight all links on any website and open them in small new windows with a single click. Use video mode to stretch the videos to save even more space. Use Incognito mode to open videos without using your account and affecting your recommendations.
